messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] weather
messages.msgSnippet: All this talk about weather reminds me.... my daughter has been watching Atmospheres on The Weather Channel lately....I think they have a schedule of it on
messages.messageBody:
All this talk about weather reminds me.... my daughter has been watching "Atmospheres" on The Weather Channel lately....I think they have a schedule of it on their web site: www.weather.com

We're kind of a "TV family" and have it on alot anyway (even when we're doing other things, I'm the kind of person who likes it on just for noise), so I figure if she's watching something that's interesting to her she'll soak more of it in.... and she really seems to like it. Obviously, it's about weather...but quite often it's about severe weather...which I think holds her ( and my) interest a little more...... I guess we're a little nerdy, but we really enjoy it. ;-)
Anyway ... I thought maybe I'd pass that idea along...
Rachelle


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
